conversationHistory.content:
For the given portfolio company, find their headquarters location. Use the PE firm name as context to help identify the correct company. Use perplexity_search or research_legal_entity to find city and state of headquarters, complete address if possible, and verify this is the main operational headquarters. Include the PE firm context in your searches to ensure accuracy. Return results as JSON: {"companies_with_locations": [{"company_name": "Company Name", "headquarters_location": {"city": "City Name", "state": "State", "full_address": "Complete address if found", "research_confidence": "high/medium/low"}}]}. Include only the formatted JSON in your response, exclude any other text or comments.

Inputs:
input: Firm: NexPhase Capital, Company: Behavior Frontiers

content.text: Let me search for information about Behavior Frontiers, using NexPhase Capital as context to ensure accuracy.

input.query: Behavior Frontiers headquarters location NexPhase Capital portfolio company

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Behavior Frontiers’ headquarters is located at 100 N Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 1400, El Segundo, CA 90245.[1]

- According to the company’s contact page, the corporate address is the above El Segundo location, with the main phone 888-922-2843.[1]  
- Industry coverage also identifies Behavior Frontiers as Los Angeles–based, consistent with the El Segundo headquarters in the LA area.[4]  
- Additional company materials list the same headquarters address.[3]

Sources:
1. https://www.behaviorfrontiers.com/contact
2. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nexphase-announces-acquisition-of-behavior-frontiers-302445786.html
3. https://www.behaviorfrontiers.com/employment-interest-form
4. https://www.beckersbehavioralhealth.com/behavioral-health-capital-investment/aba-clinic-chain-changes-hands/
5. https://www.bhcoe.org/aba-therapy/behavior-frontiers-el-segundo-california-90245/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

content.text: {"companies_with_locations": [{"company_name": "Behavior Frontiers", "headquarters_location": {"city": "El Segundo", "state": "California", "full_address": "100 N Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 1400, El Segundo, CA 90245", "research_confidence": "high"}}]}
I'll help verify if Behavior Frontiers is currently an active portfolio company. Let me search for information about their investment status.

input.query: Behavior Frontiers private equity investment ownership current portfolio company status

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Behavior Frontiers is currently owned by the private equity firm NexPhase Capital following a sale announced on May 5, 2025.[2] The company had previously been backed by Lorient Capital; the May 2025 announcements indicate NexPhase acquired the business, while not disclosing deal terms or whether Lorient retained any minority stake.[1][5]

Key details
- Buyer: NexPhase Capital, a lower middle‑market PE firm focused on healthcare, software, and consumer, targeting control buyouts.[3]
- Announcement date: May 5, 2025.[2]
- Seller/previous sponsor: Lorient Capital; under Lorient’s ownership (roughly 2019–2025), Behavior Frontiers expanded to 26 centers/home-based branches across 12 states and grew active clients from ~900 to 2,850 and employees from ~1,300 to >3,300.[1][2][5]
- Current leadership: The existing Behavior Frontiers executive team remains in place post-transaction.[1][5]
- Portfolio context: NexPhase has prior autism therapy investments (e.g., Action Behavior Centers), signaling sector experience relevant to Behavior Frontiers’ growth plan.[5]

Notes and limitations
- None of the releases disclose deal terms (valuation, ownership percentage) or explicitly confirm whether Lorient fully exited; trade coverage states it is “not clear” if Lorient remains involved.[1]

Sources:
1. https://bhbusiness.com/2025/05/05/national-autism-therapy-provider-behavior-frontiers-sells-to-nexphase-capital/
2. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/behavior-frontiers-announces-sale-to-nexphase-capital-302445660.html
3. https://www.jdsupra.com/legalnews/healthcare-life-sciences-private-equity-6786343/
4. https://www.vistaequitypartners.com/companies/portfolio/
5. https://www.beckersbehavioralhealth.com/behavioral-health-capital-investment/aba-clinic-chain-changes-hands/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}
